value:
$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|I hear the prize for victory in this
tournament is quite wonderful...
Shall we find out for ourselves?$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルム|I suppose...$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Come now... Cheer up! After all, with
the Emperor of Rigel on our side,
there's no way we can lose!$k$pIsn't that right, Your Excellency?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|Indeed.$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Oh! And there our opponents
are now. What perfect timing!$k$pLet's get started, shall we?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭ルドルフ,ch10_26_Rudlf_M_Valentine20,Face|They're putting up quite the fight.
Perhaps we ought to regroup.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルム,ch10_00_Arum_MF_Pair,Face|Ugh... I can't believe this. I must look
like such a weakling. He is surely
disappointed beyond words...$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|Alm, please. No good will come of
that kind of thinking. I'm sure we'll
make our comeback—you'll see!$k$pGoddess, grant me patience...$k$p$Sbs150|
